email: The email you entered is invalid
gmail: The email you enter must be gmail.com
passwordComplexity: Password must contain at least one letter, at least one number, and at least one special character
passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number
passwordSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character
passwordLetterAndNumber: Password must contain at least one letter and one number
passwordLetterAndSpecial: Password must contain at least one letter and one special character
phone: The phone number you entered is invalid
phoneLength: The phone number should consist of 10 to 15 digits
phoneNumeric: Phone numbers can only contain numbers
username: Username must be at least 5 characters long and contain only letters and numbers
alphaNumeric: Only letters and numbers are allowed
alphaNumericSpace: Only letters, numbers, and spaces are allowed
alphaSpace: Only letters and spaces are allowed
date: The date format must follow the YYYY-MM-DD format
time: The time format must follow the hh:mm format
dateTime: The date and time format must follow the YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm format
url: URLs must start with http:// or https://
